profile:
A private residence should be staged prior to putting it up for sale in the real estate marketplace. The initial assessment is designed to review your house from a buyer's perspective. We focus on improving home's potential, identify problem areas and provide creative solutions. Our goal is to help home owner to sell quickly and for the most amount of money.
You only get ONE CHANCE to make a FIRST IMPRESSION!

Services Provided
Art Selection, Color Consulting, Decluttering, Downsizing, Feng Shui Design, Furniture Selection, Space Planning, House Staging, Interior re-design, Kitchen Remodeling, Trim Installation, Basement Finishing, Electrical Work, Personal Shopping, Staging Assessment/ Consult, Renovations, Bathroom Remodeling

Areas Served
Hamilton, Ancaster, Burlington, Dundas, Stoney Creek, Waterdown

Certifications and Awards
Certified Accredited Home Stager
Best Houzz 2017 for Services
RESA member

profile: Mashed Interiors is your trusted source for Home Staging Consulting, ReDesign and Interior Decorating.  We work with both Real Estate Agents as well as Home Sellers to maximize the showing capability of each and every property.  Unlike most staging companies, we visit each home and do our utmost to use the pieces that are already in the home in order to keep costs to a minimum.  We of course have an abundance of furnishings and accent pieces at our disposal if the need should arise to use them.  We will do whatever it takes to make each and every property look 100%!
